title: Liz Truss
author: Liz Truss
content: Any FIFAWorldCup crypto tokens on your radar at the moment? ‚öΩÔ∏èMore than 3.57 billion watched the last world cup in 2018, effectively more than half the population at that stage.World cup fan tokens are one of the few narratives to play right now4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoins

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMAny FIFAWorldCup crypto tokens on your radar at the moment? ‚öΩÔ∏èI don't have any on my radar. Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMMore than 3.57 billion watched the last world cup in 2018, effectively more than half the population at that stage.Did you think those 3.57 billions people will be buying the tokens that have made paid for partnership to the world cup? I don't think so. Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMWorld cup fan tokens are one of the few narratives to play right now4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoinsSure but i will not even hundred percent believes if those tokens will be pumped during the world cup. The sense scenario is the hype will be disappeared due to the bearish market. World cup is something that doesn't have any direct cooperation. The project like algo was only paying for promotion purpose only. I don't even thing such marketing will be so effective to drive the price to increase.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: With the current event, I may say that their chance to pump up will increase and it's really better to consider holding those coins until they reached your desirable price to sell them. Many people missed this opportunity due to a lack of knowledge where they don't even know that these coins existed. But to be fair, this is not 100% sure this is of course just speculation, and anything could happen otherwise. If you already have these coins, it's better to hold them and if you don't have any of those, you might better check which one has the potential to grow with the current World Cup and avoid any excessive investment which will lead you to lose all of your money when the coins will fall instead of rising.

comments.author: crutu
comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMAny FIFAWorldCup crypto tokens on your radar at the moment? ‚öΩÔ∏èMore than 3.57 billion watched the last world cup in 2018, effectively more than half the population at that stage.World cup fan tokens are one of the few narratives to play right now4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoinsof these 4 types of coins, I think Algo is very influential to get a short profit with the world cup, judging from the trading volume is much more increased than before, but this type of coin is of course only a seasonal coin that is easy to pump and use for profit¬† fast.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think I may find an opening entry on algo and chz, cause these two are currently related to world cup and as you know, whales are very obvious on some fundamentals when it comes to market sympathy. It will surely make a good profit when the world cups begin. Not so fan of fan tokens but these too can also have a good movement during the said event.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: bitcampaign on November 08, 2022, 07:22:39 AMi have some Fan tokens on binance it's much safer to buy them there , so i'm not interested in list 4 because it's not very interesting for memes in world cup, CHZ and ALGO i've had losses investing in these 2 tokens before, so i never touch them againYeah you just said about the truth. OP is being very optimistic with all of those coins that listed above. he doesn't even know if sometime the participation of crypto project to be a partnership or sponsor for the world cup can give nothing at the end. My main concern is algorand is not a good blockchain. This blockchain has less and less users since it was not able competing with another new blockchain that keeps coming to the market. I guess those projects were wasting their money just to be a sponsor for the world cup. I never take it as a serious effort. Fan token was actually pump and dump token. It's fine sometime it can also be pumped by the whales but it's not with algorand. I don't even think meme token would be affected by world cup. this meme token was just useless meme token.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: aubert on November 07, 2022, 01:31:35 PMQuote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMMore than 3.57 billion watched the last world cup in 2018, effectively more than half the population at that stage.Did you think those 3.57 billions people will be buying the tokens that have made paid for partnership to the world cup? I don't think so. Even just for 10% I don't think so, because not all viewers of this big event are lovers or already know about cryptocurrenciesSuch big events are hard to miss by speculators because they see the great potential to make profits in these big events.keep watching the movement of fan tokens, especially those listed on Binance, check on Coinmarketcap they have increased.But I don't like to be involved in this kind of movement, because with a short duration of the event if you are not quick to enter and leave the market it is very possible to end up being a long holder or making cut loss as the decline continues.

comments.author: ahyadinnn
comments.body: unfortunately the 4 coin fans mentioned are not in the list of events held by binance, and I'm not sure many people know about coin fans,¬† ¬† there must be an event that can make the price go up and I haven't seen any event that will be held by the 4 coins you mentioned

comments.author: sana54210
comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMWorld cup fan tokens are one of the few narratives to play right now4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoinsInterestingly, even though these should not be pumped during that period because it‚Äôs a very dangerous thing to do, I am sure that they will be pumped for sure. I know that it is not going to be simple to tell people "do not hype related coins just because we are in world cup" but they won't listen to us at all.In the end, I will not invest into it and be certain that I won't lose money here, and there will be "some" people who will invest into it and some of them will win money from the hype, and some of them will lose money because of the crash. That‚Äôs has always been the results of the hyped stuff, if they are hyped then it will always win some lose some situation.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: ahyadinnn on November 08, 2022, 10:11:42 AMunfortunately the 4 coin fans mentioned are not in the list of events held by binance, and I'm not sure many people know about coin fans,¬† ¬† there must be an event that can make the price go up and I haven't seen any event that will be held by the 4 coins you mentionedI see these projects for the first time. I am not even familiar with any of the projects on this list... I guess these coins could be pumped in the upcoming months, and maybe there can be some profit in buying them now, but that also can lead to a loss of money! Not sure how to say it, but following hypes is not something advisable... there can be some money in that, but in most cases, it's a road to nowhere.In the end, it's the world cup in soccer... it takes a lot of money to get involved. Except for crypto casinos that are sponsoring some teams (BC.Game is an official sponsor of Argentina), I am not sure if is there any other crypto service mentioned and connected with the world cup, Qatar paid that with hard cash probably.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: The 4th option still looks more plausible, depending on each stage, either meme coins or NFT will appear for this event.I can say for sure that the cryptocurrency will be tightly connected with the championship this time.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: Quote from: bitcampaign on November 08, 2022, 07:22:39 AMi have some Fan tokens on binance it's much safer to buy them there , so i'm not interested in list 4 because it's not very interesting for memes in world cup, CHZ and ALGO i've had losses investing in these 2 tokens before, so i never touch them againyou may buy too early. I also have some Fan tokens on binance and also I am interested and monitoring CHZ as one of the World Cup related tokens. when all coins are crashing as they are right now including Fan tokens, this is a great opportunity to start logging in and holding them until the world cup is over. Convinced that there will be a drastic price increase for Fan tokens when the world cup is held. choose your best fan token and hold it until it gives a profit.

comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AMAny FIFAWorldCup crypto tokens on your radar at the moment? ‚öΩÔ∏èMore than 3.57 billion watched the last world cup in 2018, effectively more than half the population at that stage.World cup fan tokens are one of the few narratives to play right now4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoinsWorld Cup related meme coins?¬† How rediculous is that.¬† I hope everyone steers clear of any of these stupid tokens.¬† It's only gonna make a lot of people broke and a small few winners.¬† Outside of pure greed why would you ever put your money into anything like that is beyond me.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Just a little bit of narrative at play? You say that and there is absolutely no solid basis that tokens are pumped. Such speculation is always used by the token community and attracts listeners thereby automatically increasing the volume of purchases, but there are already people ready to make a quick profit.However, from the names of the tokens above, there is a correlation when they become world cup sponsors. With various speculations could potentially increase, But not completely sure it will 100% pump up significantly. If you have some research it will be good enough and stick to what makes you feel confident about going to the moon.

comments.author: Rufsilf
comments.body: I believe in hype and that will be the reason for a possible pump in these projects. I know some people will take advantage of that situation and buy these coins but it was to know also that this won't take so long as an abrupt change and dump are likely possible to take place after it. Do invest in them OP if you can but never say assurance that it will pump for the other. Holders will never take them as they wanted for long-term investment, not in a hype projects.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 07, 2022, 11:36:30 AM4 coins that could pump because of the World Cup üèÜ1. $ALGO2. $CHZ3. Fan tokens4. World Cup related memecoinsI think for fan tokens, they're really going to get some buff but for most of them I think that chiliz is going to be the one that will get the main attention of this event. As for Algo, I don't know why it's going to get some pump during this world cup. So, aside from these fan tokens and for those world cup related meme coins, how they're going to be justified that they'll sure get a pump?Anyway, what are those WC meme coins? It's a risky investment if you're going to put up some money there.
